EmailTemplate.name: 2019_Brazil_Service_Center_Invitation.2019_Brazil_RSVP_Confirmation_Email
EmailTemplate.subject: [Registration Confirmed] {{my.Event Name:default=edit me}}, {{my.Event Date:default=edit me}}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}},
We'd like to confirm that you have successfully registered for the Honeywell Brazil Service Center Grand Opening event.
DATE: August 8, 2019 TIME: 11 AM - 3 PM ADDRESS: Technology Park São José dos Campos, Estrada Dr. Altino Bondensan, 500 - Eugênio de Melo, São José dos Campos - SP, 12247-016, Brazil
Directions to Technology Park from São José dos Campos Airport Rua Doutora Tânia Lis Tizzoni Nogueira, S/N - Parque Martin Cerere, São José dos Campos
- Take R. Dra. Tânia Lis Tizzoni Nogueira and Av. dos Astronautas to BR-116 in Vila Sao Benedito (4.6 km) - Turn right onto BR-116 and drive to Exit 138. (8.7 km) - Take exit 138 to Estrada Dr. Altino Bondensan - Turn right into Technology Park São José dos Campos, Estrada Dr. Altino Bondensan, 500 - Eugênio de Melo, São José dos Campos - SP, 12247-016, Brazil
Please contact us at WHOM with any questions.
We look forward to meeting you!
